<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

@cyrush Trying to install Conduit using GCC with recent version (1bb94f2913b8657ce098230f33a08be38e1ba05a) of the spack repo fails.

==> Error: TypeError: argument of type 'NoneType' is not iterable                                         
                                                                                                           
/global/cfs/cdirs/m3363/lbann/spack.git/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/conduit/package.py:374, in create_host_config: 
        371        if fflags:                                                                                                                             
        372            cfg.write(cmake_cache_entry("CMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS", fflags))                                        
        373                                                                           
  >>    374        if ("gfortran" in f_compiler) and ("clang" in cpp_compiler):                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
        375            libdir = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(                                                                                                            
        376                                  os.path.dirname(f_compiler)), "lib")                                    
        377            flags = ""                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                      
See build log for details:                                                                                                      
  /tmp/vanessen/spack-stage/spack-stage-conduit-0.5.1-662mi2v6cizc6hrpskckss2o2v7mw3bk/spack-build-out.txt                                                                                                   
                                                                                                      
==> Error: Failed to install conduit due to ChildError: TypeError: argument of type 'NoneType' is not iterable
/global/cfs/cdirs/m3363/lbann/spack.git/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/conduit/package.py:374, in create_host_config:
        371        if fflags:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
        372            cfg.write(cmake_cache_entry("CMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS", fflags))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
        373                                                                            
  >>    374        if ("gfortran" in f_compiler) and ("clang" in cpp_compiler):                                                                                                                              
        375            libdir = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(                                                                                                                      
        376                                  os.path.dirname(f_compiler)), "lib")                             
        377            flags = ""                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
See build log for details:                                                          


The following hash works: dcd22517c7258c10cc4403378307eb38c4058d7d

I am guessing that the following commit introduced this error: 506f31b7a7fa1ebabdb4ce5d1764b0a197e62989

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
I am installing an environment for building LBANN that uses Conduit in its dependencies.
